name: available
description: Determine whether or not the specified domain is available for purchase

domain.description: Domain name whose availability is to be checked

forTransfer.description: Whether or not to include domains available for transfer. If set to True, checkType is ignored

$ul: **available**: Whether or not the domain name is available
**currency**: Currency in which the `price` is listed. Only returned if tld is offered (default: USD)
**definitive**: Whether or not the `available` answer has been definitively verified with the registry
**domain**: Domain name
**period**: Number of years included in the price. Only returned if tld is offered
**price**: Price of the domain excluding taxes or fees. Only returned if tld is offered
